options.name: Commander
options.description: Gain +1 Presence and +1 Tactics. Allies within 30 feet gain +1 to Initiative rolls.

options.name: Tactical Analysis
options.description: As a bonus action, you can identify the weaknesses of an enemy you can see. You and your allies gain +1 to Attack rolls against that enemy.

options.name: Inspiring Leader
options.description: After a short rest, you can give an inspiring speech. Up to six allies who hear it gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Presence modifier.

options.name: Combat Coordinator
options.description: Gain +1 Tactics. As a bonus action, you can grant an ally within 60 feet a special reaction they can use before your next turn.

options.name: Action : Pincer Maneuver
options.description: Designate an enemy and an ally. If both you and that ally attack the designated enemy before the end of your next turn, both attacks have advantage.

options.name: Reaction : Redirect Attack
options.description: When an ally within 30 feet is hit by an attack, you can direct another ally within 5 feet of the target to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

options.name: Master Tactician
options.description: Gain +1 Presence and +1 Tactics. At the start of combat, you can rearrange the initiative order for you and up to three allies.

options.name: Action : Strategic Advantage
options.description: Analyze the battlefield and designate up to three points as strategic positions. Allies who move to these positions gain +1 to Attack and +1 to AC until they move.

options.name: Rallying Cry
options.description: As a bonus action, you can shout a rallying cry. Allies within 60 feet who can hear you gain advantage on their next Attack roll and +1d4 temporary hit points.

options.name: Master Commander
options.description: Gain +1 Presence and +1 Tactics. Once per combat, you can grant an ally an entire extra turn that they take immediately after yours.
